Articles.Content:
Hello KSP team!

I was just wondering if it is possible to modify my save so that I could freely transport fuel from one part to the other. I have completely forgotten to allow that when starting a new game and I really would love to have that feature.

Is it possible to modify my saved game and allowing me this fuel management feature?

I have tried changing this line in latest quicksaves sfs and persistent.sfs. I have reloaded the game after the changes but did not work.

 

ResourceTransferObeyCrossfeed = True

Changed to

ResourceTransferObeyCrossfeed = False

 

Any clues what else I could do? Thanks in advance!
If you hit Escape while playing and go into game difficulty options you should be able to turn it off/on as you please.

I notice you mention quicksaves, in which case you need to keep one other thing in mind: reloading a quicksave from before you made changes to game settings will revert the changes - including a change to the resource transfer setting.

Best thing to do is as @Rocket In My Pocket said, change it from the in-game difficulty options, then immediately save it as a named save, and only use that save (and any saves from that point on) to continue the game.

You're awesome thanks!

 

Sorry for late reply
